CustomField.formula:
IF(
AND(
ISPICKVAL(Account_Temperature__c,"Hot"), ISPICKVAL( Key_Account__c ,"Key Account") ),
IMAGE("/resource/1553274837000/Crown_Icon", "crown") & " " & IMAGE("/resource/1553274971000/Flame_Icon", "flame"),
IF(
ISPICKVAL(Account_Temperature__c,"Hot"),
IMAGE("/resource/1553274971000/Flame_Icon", "flame"),
IF(
ISPICKVAL( Key_Account__c ,"Key Account"),
IMAGE("/resource/1553274837000/Crown_Icon", "crown"), "" ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Controlled by the Account Temperature and Key Account fields. Flame = Sensitive Customer. Crown = VIP treatment.
CustomField.label: Account Designation
